titles.title: A bill to amend part B of title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for payment for facility services provided in conjunction with extracorporeal shock wave lithotripsy.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 3/26/1987--Introduced. Amends part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to cover services furnished by ambulatory surgical centers in connection with extracorporeal shock wave lithotripsy.
